item.title: Man accused of setting fire to 11 NYPD vehicles is arrested and charged with arson
item.description: A 21-year-old man has been charged with setting fire to 11 New York City police vehicles in Brooklyn during a time of nationwide protests in June

item.title: Oregon authorities are still searching for 2 missing after a fatal waterfall accident
item.description: Oregon authorities are continuing to search for two people missing after a fatal waterfall accident

item.title: Ecuadorian drug lord 'Fito' pleads not guilty after being extradited to New York
item.description: The head of a violent Ecuadorian gang has pleaded not guilty to drug and gun charges in New York

item.title: Alabama man's death is ruled a homicide after police kneeled on his neck
item.description: A county coroner in Alabama is ruling the death of a man who died in an encounter with police as a homicide

item.title: Minnesota lawmaker to resign after being convicted of felony burglary
item.description: Minnesota state senator Nicole Mitchell's lawyer says that she will resign after she was convicted of burglary
